short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome plugin enhances Yonyx platform, simplifying the experience for call center agents utilizing interactive decision trees.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome plugin enhances the Yonyx platform, simplifying the experience for call center agents utilizing interactive decision trees. With this plugin, users unlock the ability to present step-by-step guidance in the browser side panel, which can be adjusted to their preference. This feature allows easy access to various browser-based applications like CRM, phone systems, or internal tools while simultaneously following business process guidance. This plugin also facilitates retrieval of data from specific fields in third-party apps resulting in a seamless and productive call experience.
